author: jycli
msg: Set allowDetachToRelease flag to false, which allow caching of the arguments

author: jycli
msg: xsl:message instruction is allowed inside func:function.
It doesn't construct nodes as part of the result.

author: jycli
msg: detach location path iterators happens only when allowDetach flag is true.

author: jycli
msg: A reworked patch, move the push statements to the beginning of try block
and added a flag to make sure that there is always something to pop

author: jycli
msg: For included stylesheet, set the _numberFormattingUsed flag to true
